Comments_List: Learned to think critically and creatively about science, got to put class knowledge to practical use. Also learned about lab dynamic and how to communicate in difficult situations.
Poor mentorship and communication this semester made research difficult. More concrete mentorship expectations would be valuable.
Would recommend research for credit if you definitely have a good mentor and project already set up.
